titles: The spirituall-mans aime guiding a Christian in his affections and actions, through the sundry passages of this life, so that Gods glory, and his owne salvation may be the maine end of all / by the faithfull and reverend divine, R. Sibbes ... ; published by T.G. and P.N.
author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton, for Iohn Rothwell, and are to be sold at the Sunne in Pauls church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
